title: Morgan Stanley Profit Rises, Powered by Deal Making, Trading; New York bank says third-quarter profit rose 36%
text:
SHARE YOUR THOUGHTS

What do you make of Morgan Stanley's third-quarter earnings? Join the conversation below.

Advisory revenue more than tripled to $1.27 billion, powered by an industrywide boom in mergers and acquisitions.

Trading revenue also rose. JPMorgan Chase & Co. said Wednesday that its third-quarter trading revenue fell 5%.

Bank earnings
